ygData.subject: Charm to be fixed again
ygData.msgSnippet: This in from Abashi yesterday... ... Thanks for bringing this back up front. I was looking for it earlier. Yes, it appears that we introduced a bug last week
ygData.messageBody:
This in from Abashi yesterday...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------
Thanks for bringing this back up front. I was looking for it earlier.

Yes, it appears that we introduced a bug last week that capped a bards
attempts to charm at their level. This unintentionally affected the lower
level charm song as well as the upper level. We'll be fixing this when we
patch spells next. No other charm spells were affected.

-Gordon
posted 04-25-2000 10:49 PM
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------

Now, if only we could get them to look at the inability to refresh charm
till it's worn off.

Draelon
